Helper to generate an input field that uses a "checked" attribute (e.g., radio buttons or checkboxes).

package Aura.View

 Methods

Returns an `<input>` tag, optionally wrapped in a `<label>` tag.

__invoke(array $attribs, mixed $value) : string
Inherited

inherited_from \Aura\View\Helper\Form\Input\Generic::__invoke()

Parameters

$attribs

array

Attributes for the input tag.

$value

mixed

The field value for the input element. This may overwrite the 'value' attribute, or may be used to see if the 'checked' attribute should be set, depending on the input type. This may also include a pseudo-attribute 'label' to be used as a label around the input, such as for checkbox or radio inputs.

Returns

string

Returns the input field HTML based on a field specification.
